resources.string:
"India's First Integrated 24*7
helpline to trigger
Emergency Care and Road Side
Assistance"

For every plan to be successful, every aspect of the
plan must be executed exceptionally. This
necessitates the importance of segregation. That is
why isafe has come up iwth idea of domains.
Domains ensure that every aspect concerned with
road safety has been covered and every person
who wants to help towards the cause irrespective of
their field of work can work with the Indian Road
Safety Campaign.
